extendedInfo.description: Tweet us At @DeadlyAppsUse the Hashtag #TwitADex#TwitADex is a Twitter App in 3d. Not only is the UI clean and intuitive but it is fun as well. The main Twitter menu is a Radial menu. When you tap and hold the menu you can choose what action you want to take. If you want to write a new tweet, click and hold the center of the screen then move your finger up, then release.When writing a new tweet #TwitADex will keep a history of your previous Mentions and Hashtags, and will allow you to re-use the most recent 3. Also when typing a @ and #, #TwitADex will prompt you with a best fit history of Mentions or Hashtags you have used previously with Twitter.In #TwitADex your home timeline is now a spiral. As you load tweets the spiral gets longer. You can wheel through your tweets in landscape or portrait modes to see more or larger tweets. Tapping on a tweet will enlarge that tweet and give you the option to Reply, Retweet, Favorite, Or go to the User Profile of the author of the tweet.The use profile menu also done in the same style. Each option enlarges as you drag  your finger over them, the action occurs when you release your finger from the enlarged button.Navigate the radial menu to the # symbol to see the Search and âWhatâs Trending?â in Twitter options.Trends are GPS local and can be navigated to via the spiral.#TwitADex also supports Twitters Direct Messages, Favorites, Lists, and much much more. If you want the best Twitter timeline out there, use #TwitADex!

reviews.title: Very unique!
reviews.comment: Would be my client if it had the option to see others @ replies.  Update  -  ah I meant replies to a username not just a conversation
reviews.author: Dean F-P

reviews.title: Nice Original Concept
reviews.comment: But a tweet marker (remembering Where I Was) and the ability to refresh without having to go back to the wheel notifications and to be able to see pics and enlarge Avatar pics I would pay for this and give 5 stars
reviews.author: Kushone Green

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: (Has adds) nice UI (5star)  runs smooth and nice.
reviews.author: Adam Hernandez

reviews.title: It doesn\'t allow notification
reviews.comment: No notifications, could use some background color display or even allow theme options but until notifications is solved which is biggest issue 2stars but good concept...

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Love the app but y when ppl tweet pics it doesn\'t show?
reviews.author: Joshua Colon

reviews.title: Problem for s3
reviews.comment: Pin code screen reloaded again & again
reviews.author: tolga cakir

reviews.title: It needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: Like it\'s own browser. Retweet -quoting options. Ability to view pictures in app. Notifications in our phones status bar. Different theme choices as well. I hope this app doesn\'t get abandoned like the carbon for twitter app and this gets worked on and updated. This is a good app idea for twitter. I like all the moving tweets.
reviews.author: De Naja\' Handy

reviews.title: Can\'t log in.
reviews.comment: I get the authorisation code and as soon as I go back to the app, it doesn\'t let me enter the code but makes authorise all over again. Haven\'t even had the chance to enjoy yet. ): (and it\'s the latest version)

reviews.title: Support arabic
reviews.comment: Please support arabic
reviews.author: Essam h

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: Nice visuals, performs well. Something this graphically focus, you typically expect a clunky, laggy mess.  Much improved from when i last used it, cleaner, better organized. Scrolling could still use some work though, its not very smooth. But its grown into a very serviceable and reliable twitter client, great for the average user.
reviews.author: Brandon Baker

reviews.title: Can\'t sign in
reviews.comment: Really cool design. Can\'t wait to see more features and options added  Sign in is rough. Doesn\'t automatically apply the twitter token so after I go back to app in won\'t let me enter the authorization code
reviews.author: Jeremy DeBose

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Sort out the Back button problem and its 5/5.   Have to close out and kill the app after i read a tweet. Which is a shame. Because its exactly what i was looking for. Added extra stars for the support
reviews.author: Brian Sherry

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: I love the 3D concept and the ongoing improvements make this more than just visual eye candy. The developer is responsive and hard working.
reviews.author: Deth Im

reviews.title: This needs more coverage
reviews.comment: An application like this is definitely worth the install. It\'s a great and stylish take on the traditional twitter feed.
reviews.author: Rodney Figueroa

reviews.title: Very similar to Sony\'s Timescape
reviews.comment: The idea was there before. So, give me some time to play with it and see how it surprises me (hopefully)
reviews.author: Angga Hadi

reviews.title: Arabic!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t support Arabic language!
reviews.author: Mehyar Shammas

reviews.title: Its very unique.
reviews.comment: I like it but I get lost and can\'t tell where I\'m upto, it could do with some color as well.  Nice and smooth though :)
reviews.author: Andy Dawson

reviews.title: Crazy-cool!
reviews.comment: Real cool! Twitter timeline on a Unity wheel..now that\'s cool!
reviews.author: M.Saleh Esmaeili

reviews.comment: Nice concept, but lacking features like being able to copy tweet text and permalinks.  Nice eye-candy though, and with further development may deserve more stars.
reviews.author: Paul Hudson

reviews.title: Very cool start.
reviews.comment: I\'m really loving the concept and design of this twitter app. Probably the coolest looking one in my opinion. Would like the ability to zoom into a tweet by clicking on it. I have a feeling this is just the beginning of a really awesome twitter app.
reviews.author: Drew Monge
